com.wingfoot.soap.encoding
Interface SOAPSerializer

All Known Implementing Classes:
LiteralSerializer, SectionVSerializer
public interface SOAPSerializer

Defines the properties that are required for a class to serialize a SOAP payload.

Method Summary
 byte[] serialize()
          Converts an Envelope to a SOAP payload.

Method Detail

serializeParameter

public void serializeParameter(Element element,
                               java.lang.Object parameterValue)
                        throws SOAPException
Takes one parameter and its definition in the WSDL and converts it to XML.
Parameters:
element - the Element in WSDL that contains the definition of the parameterValue.
parameterValue - the value of the parameter.

serialize

public byte[] serialize()
                 throws SOAPException
Converts an Envelope to a SOAP payload. Concrete implementations of this interface decide the rules used to convert the parameters to SOAP payload. The concrete implementation also stores the Envelope.
Returns:
byte the binary representation of the SOAP payload
Throws:
SOAPException - if any error occurs while generating the payload.
